titleStmt.title: The true art of liuing well The right vse of things indifferent. The plaine foot-path to the paradise of God. Three sermons preached at Cambridge, Westminster, and Worcester, by Iohn Racster minister of the word, and preacher.
titleStmt.author: Racster, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for Thomas Clarke, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules church-yard at the signe of the Angell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules church-yard at the signe of the Angell
